thread.title: Dove Cameron Chopped Off Her Long Locks Into The Perfect Bob
thread.title_full: Dove Cameron Chopped Off Her Long Locks Into The Perfect Bob

author: Minou Clark
title: Dove Cameron Chopped Off Her Long Locks Into The Perfect Bob
text:
Dove Cameron Chopped Off Her Long Locks Into The Perfect Bob Snip, snip! 💇 🏼 
It’s fair to say that the long bob or “ the lob ” has become a very popular celebrity haircut trend . We’ve seen Emma Stone , Jennifer Lawrence and Kylie Jenner rock this style ― just to name a few. 
Well, now Disney star and singer Dove Cameron is sporting the chic ‘do, too. She gave fans a sneak peek of her fresh new look in her most recent Instagram post, which she shot at an event in West Hollywood hosted by Vanity Fair and L’Oreal Paris. 💇🏼💇🏼 A post shared by ♡DOVE♡ (@dovecameron) on Feb 21, 2017 at 11:06pm PST 
We’d say that’s a dramatic change, wouldn’t you? Her new, blunt chop barely reaches her shoulders! 
Emma McIntyre via Getty Images Dove Cameron and her fresh haircut in West Hollywood. 
As a refresher, here’s how long her hair was before she went full lob: A post shared by ♡DOVE♡ (@dovecameron) on Feb 16, 2017 at 7:41pm PST 
Cameron slays the lob so well, we’re almost considering going short ourselves. After all, it’s the perfect low-maintenance hairstyle for spring, which is basically right around the corner. 
Keep killing it, girl.
